title: zerks suck
body:
invest in better boots like lucidity

if you have basic boots and a zeal you have basically the same thing that zerks would give you

basic boots: 25 ms
zeal: 20% as 10% crit 5% ms

assuming base movespeed of 325 (lowest base ms in the game and what most adcs have), 5% of that is 16.25, + basic boots 25 ms = 41.25 ms

zerks: 45 ms, 25% as

so you're getting like 60% more as than a dagger and 3.75 more ms than a zeal + t1 boots and missing out on the actually worthwhile passives of the other boots - cdr from lucidity which is much harder to come by than as especially on adcs, mercs which have useful mr and tenacity which you can only get elsewhere from a zephyr/iron elixir on sr, hell you could even get tabis for armor and damage reduction

down with zerks

also, delete anivia
